title: Michael Cheika quits as Australia head coach after crashing out of Rugby World Cup
text:
Michael Cheika has quit as Australia head coach, a day after the Wallabies were knocked out of the Rugby World Cup by England in Oita.

Cheika refused to comment on his future in the aftermatch of Saturday's 40-16 defeat, calling for "a little bit of compassion for people who are hurting" when asked whether he would stay in the role.

Dave Rennie, the Glasgow Warriors head coach, has been linked with replacing Cheika.

One of the notable reactions to Cheika's departure came from Quade Cooper, the Melbourne Rebels fly-half who was not considered for selection since 2017.

"At the time [in the press conference] I was not keen to answer, but I always knew the answer in my head," Cheika told reporters...
description: Michael Cheika has quit as Australia head coach, a day after the Wallabies were knocked out of the Rugby World Cup by England in Oita.
